q1: What was Italy's record last season? I heard they did good.
q2: That's not bad, how did they do at worlds?
a2: They lost their play-off match to Sweden and therefore didn't qualify.
q3: Why do you think Italy didn't qualify despite the strength of their squad?
a3: A3: A mixture of difficult opponents and complacency in qualifying games.
q5: Of course they had to be disappointed, the first time their team did not go to the world cup
a5: It must be a very strong experience for those players
